ModMetaData.name: Simple Utilities: Ceiling HSK
ModMetaData.author: Owlchemist
ModMetaData.description: Allows the building of ceiling-mounted light fixtures, firefoam poppers, and sun lamps. Also includes dark light variants for Ideology users. The lights come in a variety of styles. Additional functionality is unlock if you have Vanilla Expanded Framework installed, as well as Perspective: Buildings.
